name: delegator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who delegates (= gives) part of their job, duties, etc. to someone else to do for them: I'm trying to cut back my 60- hour working week and I've learned to be a better delegator. As a president, he seems likely to be more of a figurehead and delegator.
More examplesFewer examplesHis chief of staff's most important skills are as a delegator and disciplinarian.I'm an easy guy to work for. I'm a delegator.Some people would say I'm a control freak but I'd say I'm a pretty good delegator.She is regarded as a skilled delegator and motivator.Do you see him as a detail guy or is he more of a delegator?
